main event: Military personnel observed a small white object resembling search lights for about 2 minutes.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2 minutes and was classified as a ground-visual observation., The object was reported to resemble search lights., There were no photographs submitted with the report., Conclusions ranged from insufficient data to a potential aircraft or astronomical object., The report was part of Project Blue Book, a historical U.S. Air Force investigation into UFOs.
witness description: military personnel who reported the sighting
